items.sentence: I\'ve been looking for a job, but nobody\'s hiring.
We\'re very interested in the history of Australia.
Tom tried to reach the top shelf, but he couldn\'t.
Tom was furious when he saw Mary kiss someone else.
This is one of the best Christmases I\'ve ever had.
I don\'t think that I can talk Tom into doing that.
I don\'t think that Tom has ever visited Australia.
I don\'t think that Tom has much money in the bank.
I don\'t think that Tom has the courage to do that.
I don\'t think that Tom has time to help you today.
